Package org.coniks.coniks_server

Provides the classes necessary to create a basic CONIKS server, as well as the classes this server uses maintain the publicly auditable key directory and to perform the CONIKS protocols with CONIKS clients.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConiksServer
    Implements the main CONIKS server operations: interface to client, initiates Merkle tree rebuilding and signed tree root (STR) generation.
    DebugLogger
    Implements a logger used for debugging the CONIKS server.
    DirectoryOps
    Implements the high-level key directory-related operations performed by a CONIKS server.
    InteriorNode
    Represents an interior node in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.
    KeyChange
    Implements a key change operation.
    KeyOps
    Implements all encryption-key related operations that a CONIKS server must perform.
    LeafNode
    Represents an generic leaf node in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.
    MsgHandlerLogger
    Implements a logger used for logging events related to handling messages received from or sent to a CONIKS client.
    Operation
    This abstract class is used to create the CONIKS name-to-key mapping-related operations.
    PaddingLeafNode
    Represents a leaf node used for padding in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.
    Register
    Implements a name-to-key mapping registration operation.
    RequestHandler
    Implements the request handler for the CONIKS server.
    RootNode
    Represents a root node in the binary Merkle prefix tree underlying the CONIKS key directory.
    ServerConfig
    Sets various configuration parameters for a ConiksServer.
    ServerHistory
    Represents the server's history.
    ServerLogger
    Implements the main logger used for a CONIKS server.
    ServerMessaging
    Implements all of the messaging operations between the server and clients.
    ServerUtils
    Implements various utility functions used by various components of a CONIKS server.
    ServerUtils.PrefixComparator
    Comparator for ordering the pendingQueue in increasing order of a data binding lookup index's first 24 bits.
    SignatureOps
    Implements all operations involving digital signatures that a CONIKS server must perform.
    SignedTreeRoot
    Represents a signed tree root, which is generated at the beginning of every epoch.
    TimerLogger
    Implements the epoch timer logger used for a CONIKS server.
    TransparencyOps
    Implements all transparency-related operations done by a CONIKS server.
    TreeBuilder
    Implements all operations necessary for building a CONIKS Merkle prefix tree on the server.
    TreeNode
    Represents an generic tree node in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.
    UserLeafNode
    Represents a leaf node containing a user's entry in the CONIKS key directory in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.

Package org.coniks.coniks_server Description

Provides the classes necessary to create a basic CONIKS server, as well as the classes this server uses maintain the publicly auditable key directory and to perform the CONIKS protocols with CONIKS clients.

This basic server supports new key registrations, key lookups and key changes. It is designed to communicate with the simple CONIKS test client.

Since:
0.2.0
